ValidationRule.description: End Date/Time must be at-least 1 day ahead of Start Date/Time
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK( End_Date__c )), OR( End_Date__c <= Start_Date__c , End_Date__c - Start_Date__c < 1 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: End date must be after 1 day of start date
